description: This file defines URL patterns for authentication endpoints in a Django REST Framework project, mapping URLs to view functions and classes related to user registration, login, token refresh, logout, and retrieving user info.

classes.name: JWTLoginView
classes.description: A view class handling JWT login, customized to allow any permission.

classes.name: JWTRefreshView
classes.description: A view class handling JWT token refresh, also allowing any permission.

methods.name: register
methods.description: A view function handling user registration.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: A view function to log out a user.

methods.name: me
methods.description: A view function to retrieve current user's information.
